actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to permit the Soboba Band of Mission Indians to participate in the Indian sanitation facilities and services program on the same basis as other federally recognized Indian groups.

summary.text: Stipulates that the Soboba Band of Mission Indians and the Soboba Indian Reservation may be provided with sanitation facilities and services.

titles.title: A bill to permit the Soboba Band of Mission Indians to participate in the Indian sanitation facilities and services program on the same basis as other federally recognized Indian groups.
